Pricing.billRemindersDescription: Automated notifications to remind tenants of upcoming or overdue rent payments, improving rent collection efficiency.
Pricing.documentVaultDescription: Store and organize your receipts, invoices, bank statements, and contracts in one place, easy to find and reference.
Pricing.goalsAndTasksDescription: Set savings goals, track your progress, and manage personal finance-related tasks.
Pricing.accountConnectionsDescription: Link your bank/investment accounts to sync real-time transactions, receive balance change and unusual spending notifications.
Pricing.financeContactsDescription: Store beneficiary, transfer recipient, service provider, and bank information for quick, accurate payments.

Contact.title: Native integrations with your banks and tools
Contact.description: Cloud-based, easy-to-use personal finance app. Link accounts, track spending, budget smarter, and maximize savings to reach your goals faster.

Footer.description: Cloud-based and easy-to-use property management software. Stay on top of your business and maximize ROI with our end-to-end solution.
